title: New Feature: Advanced OCR Capabilities Added
meta_title: Advanced OCR Feature Launched | ClaudConverter Pro News
meta_description: ClaudConverter Pro now includes advanced OCR capabilities, allowing you to convert scanned documents and images into editable text formats.
content:
Exciting news for our users! We've just rolled out an Advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) feature.

What this means for you:

  • Convert scanned PDFs to editable Word documents.
  • Extract text from images with high accuracy.
  • Support for multiple languages.

This feature is now available to all Premium users. Free users can try it out with a limited number of conversions. We believe this will significantly enhance productivity for students, researchers, and professionals alike.

title: The Growing Importance of Data Privacy in Online Tools
meta_title: Data Privacy in Online Tools | ClaudConverter Pro Insights
meta_description: An overview of why data privacy is crucial for online conversion tools and how ClaudConverter Pro prioritizes user security.
content:
In an increasingly digital world, data privacy has become a paramount concern. When using online tools, especially for file conversion, it's vital to understand how your data is handled.

Key Considerations:

  • Encryption: Are files encrypted during transit and processing?
  • Data Retention: How long are your files stored on servers?
  • Third-party Sharing: Is your data shared with any third parties?

At ClaudConverter Pro, we implement robust security measures, including end-to-end encryption for sensitive conversions and automatic file deletion from our servers after a short period. Read our full Privacy Policy.
